title: Introduction to Sustainable Farming
description: Understanding the principles of sustainable agriculture

steps.title: What is Sustainable Farming?
steps.content: Sustainable farming is an approach that meets current food needs while preserving resources for future generations.

steps.title: Core Principles
steps.content: The three pillars of sustainability: environmental health, economic profitability, and social equity.

steps.title: Benefits Overview
steps.content: Learn about improved soil health, reduced chemical inputs, and long-term viability.

title: Soil Health Assessment
description: Learn to test and evaluate soil conditions

steps.title: Visual Soil Assessment
steps.content: How to identify healthy soil through visual cues like color, texture, and organic matter.

steps.title: Simple pH Testing
steps.content: Using basic tools to test soil pH and understand its impact on plant growth.

steps.title: Soil Amendment Basics
steps.content: Introduction to organic amendments like compost and natural fertilizers.

title: Composting Fundamentals
description: Creating nutrient-rich compost for your farm

steps.title: Compost Ingredients
steps.content: Understanding the carbon-nitrogen balance with browns and greens.

steps.title: Building Your Pile
steps.content: Step-by-step instructions for creating an effective compost pile.

steps.title: Maintenance & Troubleshooting
steps.content: How to maintain proper moisture, temperature, and turn your compost.

title: Creating Your First Budget
description: Step-by-step guide to creating a personal budget

steps.title: Calculate Your Income
steps.content: List all sources of monthly income including salary, side jobs, and other earnings.

steps.title: Track Your Expenses
steps.content: Categorize and track all monthly expenses from fixed costs to variable spending.

steps.title: Set Realistic Goals
steps.content: Establish achievable savings goals and spending limits for each category.

title: Basic Life Support
description: Essential CPR and emergency response techniques

steps.title: Scene Assessment
steps.content: How to safely approach and evaluate an emergency situation.

steps.title: Check Responsiveness
steps.content: Proper techniques for checking if a person is conscious and responsive.

steps.title: CPR Technique
steps.content: Hands-on CPR instruction with proper hand placement and compression depth.

steps.title: Recovery Position
steps.content: How to place an unconscious but breathing person in the recovery position.
